titleStmt.title: An exact abridgement of the records in the Tower of London from the reign of King Edward the Second, unto King Richard the Third, of all the Parliaments holden in each Kings reign, and the several acts in every Parliament : together with the names and titles of all the dukes, marquesses, earls, viscounts, and barons, summoned to every of the said Parliaments / collected by Sir Robert Cotton ... ; revised, rectified in sundry mistakes, and supplied with a preface, marginal notes, several ommissions, and exact tables ... by William Prynne ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Cotton, Robert, Sir, 1571-1631.
Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
